title: Turkey with lentils and chorizo
ingredients: ['125g chorizo sausage, thinly sliced', '1 red onion, finely chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 celery stick, finely chopped', '300g skinless turkey breast fillets, thinly sliced', '1 red pepper, deseeded and sliced', '225g Puy lentils', '250ml dry white wine', '250ml chicken stock, hot', 'TO GARNISH', 'fresh flat-leaf parsley, chopped']
